scripts.start: tsc -p tsconfig.json --lib es2016,dom --target es2016 --allowSyntheticDefaultImports; node -r esm app.js
scripts.createdb: tsc src/db.ts --lib es2015,dom --target es2016 --allowSyntheticDefaultImports; node -r esm src/db.js
scripts.ttt: tsc ttt.ts --lib es2015,dom --target es2016 --allowSyntheticDefaultImports; node -r esm ttt.js
